reviewText: Very good DVD for learning slide guitar.  I owned a copy of this back when it was on VHS.  This is the gateway course that will allow you the tools to play or figure out anything else that has to do with slide guitar.  If you really want to learn this style of guitar playing then this is the course you want.
Looks like out of the 80's.  Nice video about what i could be.  Lot of style and grace in his playing.
